text:
The food is tasty with reasonable price. This is my 4th time visit. We always order curry fish head.
The service is good. No service charge and GST.

Came here for CNY dinner and food left us impressed! The atmosphere wasn't like the typical Chinese restaurant, felt more like a coffeeshop but it was definitely cosy. But the food was delicious! Would highly recommend the kampung chicken and fried fish. Parking is quite difficult to find as the roads are really tight, you would have to try to find parking lots in the residential area around.

Zi char dishes were generally tasty. Thai style sea bass was so worth it at $15.90! Steamed chicken was cooked well and yummy. Portions are good for the price too. Sweet and sour pork was slightly tough and more batter > meat. Not crowded on a weekday lunch.

19/10/2024
Had chicken drumstick rice with braised egg ($8.60) for lunch, was quite good. Nice Aircon dining area. Staff was friendly.

3rd visit here and always ordered the tofu. very silky!
love the food here. and especially grateful to the staffs and lady boss (?) for letting us in at 9.20pm today HAHAHA
thank you! will continue to patronise.
